title: Unable to connect to chat problem on EUNE
body: cant connect to chat i tried TCP optimizer, disabling firewall, unistalling pando media booster and stopping ip helper and nothing helped im planning to sacrifice my left pinkie to satan pls help {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: No need for duplicate threads!  We're looking into an issue where some players aren't connecting to chat.  I don't have an eta, but updated will be provided on our [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune).  Hope that helps!
